name: Gail Fissel
text: Wish there were more veggies or eggs on the salad bar but it was still good...loved the celery sticks! Nicki was an awesome server!!

name: M Wheeler
text: Small, clean, and really good service.

name: Dennis
text: I ordered the wrong pizza from the app by accident. They made a new pizza for me and they were very friendly and helpful. Thank you

name: Julie Tollen
text: I come to Pizza Hut frequently as it is close to my home. I know quite a few waitresses, all of whom are very nice. Unfortunately, there is no delivery there. However, the fresh salad bar makes up for it. My favorite  thing about this Pizza …More

name: Josh Wagner
text: Hsvent been here since bubba ds opened. A  Call ahead cheese pizza took 45 minutes to cook and it looked like it was in the oven all 45 minutes. Completely burnt to the point it was blackened on top. They make a new one and this time forget …More

name: Jennifer Wallace
text: Terrible service. They forgot to put pepperoni on my pizza and threw some on after it was baked and tried to serve it to me that way. Got an attitude when I questioned it. And my other pizza was a pan pizza and it didnt taste like it usually does when I've gotten it before. Crust was so dry.

name: Mark Walter
text: This is our favorite pizza place in the area. Good pizza at good prices with good service! Plus the place is almost never crowded & the staff is always friendly.

name: Mary Currie
text: The salad bar is never fresh. They have no sharp knives to cut salad items in smaller pieces. The untensils they will give you won't even cut the small tomatoes. That is my biggest  disappointment with them. …More

name: Pamela Larsen
text: Servers are very nice.  Food is always good and prepared correctly.  Place needs a update.

name: Vickie Reeves
text: Pizza hut dough is made ahead then frozen and the store thaws crust and let's it rise, then bakes it.  YUCK NOT HAND TOSSED FRESH DOUGH.

name: Bridgett Grove
text: BEWARE! If you use your card here make sure you check your account! We were charged twice, which came close to $100. Luckily we pay close attention to our account. I wonder how many people they have done this too and gotten away with it. …More

name: Monika Brown
text: Food good customer service not so

name: Dennis Fink
text:
Our experience at pizza hut was great
We always go there for our pizza

name: Georgia Raterman
text: Good food but no beer. Could be updated!

name: Spenser Rush
text: The pizza had so much buffalo sauce it just tasted like vinegar and I immediately started choking.

name: Mike Anderson
text: Really relaxed visit. It's a pizza hut. If you've been to one you've been to them all. But as usual food was good, staff friendly, prices fair.

name: captainofechosound
text: Great pizza  , the interior needs some work

name: Christina Whelan
text: The lady on the phone was very polite and willing to help me. Thank you!!!

name: Charlie Miller
text: The place is closed not for the day. I mean closed as in out of business.

name: Charles Miller
text: Great food and a good place to work

name: Kim Krynock
text: Their thin crust pizza is outstanding!

name: boBspelt backwards
text: It was a nice experience.

name: Omar Ortiz
text: Awful.... asked for bacon, I got all the soggy FAT of the bacon on my whole pie not one Krispy bit.

name: Gary Atkinson
text: I get one of their mobile app deals every other week. Good pizza.

name: TellYouWhat 95
text: good service it was fast and cooked but they put no sauce on all the pizzas i got. i will try dominos next time and make my decision

name: Daisy Hardenstine
text: Excellent service and very accommodating. We called in and our pizza was ready when we got there. Checkout their specials. We were pleasantly suprised.

name: Mr. Epicocean
text: I'm a teenager so pretty much all pizza is good but here it is especially good

name: Angel A
text: Ordered online and they had food ready when I got there. Pizza was good

name: Ipbunpak One
text: Good pizza.

name: William Corrigan
text: Nothing special to say. It's a Pizza Hut. It is the same place you went to as a kid and the food and decor are about the same too.

name: Kimberly Knightengale
text: Server was so sweet n accommodating.personal pizza salad

name: Mr Ed
text: I don't know how to say this but the pizza actually had a terrible smell to it. Enough of a smell that my 4 year old wasn't interested in eating it after a 1 long swim lesson. The restaurant was extremely dirty tables were sticky. …More

name: Jenn Ermler
text: Staff very rude especially the mgmt. Order was incorrect and salad was sour and frozen from the salad bar.

name: Steve Frederick
text: it's was just ok for a pizza hut, very nice people working there though

name: James Eaton
text: Food was good, service was good

name: Barbara Krause
text: They have real good pizza

name: Scottt Williams
text: Order thru their app. Easy to use. Plus discounts

name: Jess BURTOP
text: Service was terrible. Waitress didn't care if she served you or not. Food was good when you finally got it :(

name: Connor Smith
text: Nice amount of chatting without being annoying.

name: Melissa Deneen
text: Solid 10 forever

name: Julie Wadsworth
text: Really deliciously good pizza!

name: Denise Cochran

name: richard skelton

text: Good pizza but it can get expensive when feeding a family of 5

text: Clean place but if sometimes when you call in orders and they tell you 45minutes it's really 1 hour

name: Galo Cabrera
text: Great pizza.

name: Kyle Dulski
text: Has deteriorated over time, the salad bar isn't special. Honestly has a problem competing with the dominoes. Doesn't deliver. The only special thing about this pizza hut is the fact that it has stuffed crust.

name: James Hamilton
text: This location is hardly ever crowded and service has always been pleasant and prompt.

name: Dion Woods
text: Gross!

name: Justin Norcross
text: Food is no different than any other Pizza Hut. They don't deliver which isn't that bad but whenever I picked up my food at the designated times it seems like its been sitting there awhile and is overcooked.

name: Alex Bleickhardt
text: Doesn't deliver
